title: Distribution Matching with NCFD

definitions.CF-based methods: CF-based methods directly compare distributions by balancing the amplitude and phase in the complex plane, enhancing distributional similarity.

formulas: minimizing CF makes the distributions similar
summary: The slide discusses Distribution Matching with NCFD, explaining that CF-based methods enhance distributional similarity by balancing amplitude and phase in the complex plane. It includes a visual representation of Characteristic Function Matching over iterations.
